person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: I’m sorry to hear that! How has this affected your motivation to study or focus on other tasks?

person_say: My exam results weren't what I expected, and I feel like a failure. It's really affecting my motivation to study for my next subjects.
animal_say: That’s tough! I know a wise bee named Bizy who can help with motivation and time management. Would you like to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds great! I would love to get some help with motivation and time management.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will help you find your motivation and manage your time effectively. Let’s go see her!
